Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Jeopardy! Training Application

Full-featured web application for Jeopardy! training with:
- User authentication with NextAuth.js
- Quiz interface with 500,000+ questions
- Mastery-based review system (3 correct in a row)
- Performance dashboard with category analytics
- Archive feature for questions with missing media
- Review pages for wrong answers and mastered questions

Tech stack:
- Next.js 15 with TypeScript
- PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Tailwind CSS
- Recharts for analytics

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add automated deployment configuration

Deployment setup for Unraid with Traefik:
- Dockerfile: Multi-stage build for optimized production image
- docker-compose.yml: Container orchestration with Traefik labels
- GitHub Actions: Automated CI/CD pipeline to GHCR
- Watchtower integration: Auto-updates on new image push
- Comprehensive deployment documentation

Features:
- Push to main triggers automatic deployment
- Tailscale-only access for privacy
- SSL via Let''s Encrypt through Traefik
- Reusable pattern for future web apps
